data.title: Public restrooms in the City of Boston
data.text:
Boston Fire Department

District 11 Engine 29 and Ladder 11

138 Chestnut Hill Avenue

Open 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

One unisex, wheelchair-accessible stall

No family bathroom

Don't need to use stairs to enter building, bathroom

Boston Fire Department

District 11 Engine 51

425 Faneuil Street

Open 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

One unisex, wheelchair-accessible stall

No family bathroom

Don't need to use stairs to enter building, bathroom

/*-->*/

Boston Police Department

District D-14, 301 Washington Street

Open 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

One unisex, wheelchair-accessible stall

No family bathroom

Don't need to use stairs to enter building, bathroom

Boston Public Library - Brighton

40 Academy Hill Road

Monday: 12 p.m. – 8 p.m.

Tuesday through Wednesday: 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.

Thursday: 12 p.m. – 8 p.m.

Friday through Saturday: 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.

Sunday: Closed

wheelchair-accessible stalls

Two gender-specific bathrooms (one male stall, one female stall)

Both bathrooms are family-friendly (they have changing tables)

Don't need to use stairs to enter building, bathroom

Boston Public Library - Faneuil

419 Faneuil Street

Monday: 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.

Tuesday: 12 p.m. – 8 p.m.

Wednesday and Thursday: 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.

Friday: 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.

Saturday: 9 a.m. – 2 p.m.

Sunday: Closed

One unisex bathroom stall (it's not wheelchair-accessible)

No family bathroom

Need to use stairs to enter building, bathroom

Boston Public Library - Honan-Allston

300 North Harvard Street

Monday: 12 p.m. – 8 p.m.

Tuesday: 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.

Wednesday: 12 p.m. – 8 p.m.

Thursday: 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.

Friday and Saturday: 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.

Sunday: Closed

wheelchair-accessible stalls

Three gender-specific bathrooms (one male, two female)

Three unisex stalls (they each feature changing tables for families)

Don't need to use stairs to enter building, bathroom

BCYF Clougherty Pool

331 Bunker Hill Street

Only open during the summer, weather permitting

Monday through Friday, 11 a.m. - 7 p.m.

wheelchair-accessible stalls

There is one female stall and one unisex stall

There is no family bathroom

Don't need to use stairs to enter building, bathroom

Visitors must sign in at front desk

382 Main Street

Monday through Friday, 9 a.m. - 5 p.m.

/*-->*/

Don't need to use stairs to enter building or bathroom

/*-->*/

no family bathroom
